titleStmt.title: Proposals for raising a colledge of industry of all useful trades and husbandry with a profit for the rich, a plentiful living for the poor and a good education for youth : which will be advantage to the government by the increase of the people and their riches.
titleStmt.author: Bellers, John, 1654-1725.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed and sold by T. Sowle ...,

notesStmt.note: "To the children of light" signed: John Bellers.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
